effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.
short_effect.platinum: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A restrained attack that prevents the foe from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
flavor_text.platinum: A restrained attack that prevents the foe from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A restrained attack that prevents the foe from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
